title: {organisation_name} Organisation
reports_description: See a list of all reports the members of your organisation have created and access report details.
dashboard_description: As an owner of your organisation, you have access to seeing a  full overview of your company's usage of Wiserfunding's platform.
users_description: See all the members of your organisation that have accounts with Wiserfunding and the details of the reports they have run.
intergrations_description: Integrate with other data sources to improve the accuracy of your reports and get the latest data on the companies you're analysing.
codat_card_description: Add your headers for your Codata integration.
codat_integration_step_2: Navigate to Account on the side bar
codat_integration_step_5: Copy the Authorisation header, which looks similar to Basic XXXXXXXansdklandklasndansdadnadad21e12==
codat_integration_step_6: Paste what you copied below and click Add integration
codat_add_auth_header_description: Add the authorisation header from Codat below.
codat_auth_header_placeholder: Copy and paste your authorisation here.
organisation_user_overview_description: See details and full list of reports run by this user from your organisation and access admin functionality.
organisation_user_role_description: Toggle the role of the user from "Admin" to just a normal user.
organisation_deactivate_user_description: Deactivate this user to prevent them from being able to access their account or reports.
organisation_user_reports_description: A list of all recent reports this user has run.
add_user_description: Use the for below to add a new user to your organisation. They will recieve an email from Wiserfunding with their account details to login and create an account.
new_user_form_description: Add the new users details below, then click 'Add new user'.
first_and_last_required: A first and last name is required.
valid_password_required: A valid password is required (at least 8 characters with at least 1 upper case, 1 lower case, 1 numeric and 1 symbol).

errors.first_and_last_required: A first and last name is required.
errors.valid_password_required: A valid password is required (at least 8 characters with at least 1 upper case, 1 lower case, 1 numeric and 1 symbol).
